verbs.description: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] hold their historic Singapore summit at the Capella Hotel on the city - state ’s Sentosa Island , White House press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders said Tuesday on Twitter .

President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will hold their historic Singapore summit at the Capella Hotel on the city - state ’s Sentosa Island , [ARG0: White House press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] .
